item.title: Camp Stations
item.description: 🏔️ Mountains Location: Dharamshala, Himachal Pradesh Coming soon… (Early 2022) 🌴 Farm Location: Krushi Kutumba, Mysore (Karnataka) Suthur, Main Road S, Hosakote, Karnataka (570022) Office Address: 5/1, Rich Homes Apartment, PH01, 6th Floor, Richmond Rd, Ashok Nagar, Bengaluru, Karnataka (560025) Email : hello@hackerfarm.in Contact/Whatsapp : +91 957-924-0555

item.title: Join
item.description: 👉🏻 How Do I Join HackerFarm? Applicants should be above 18 years old and should have access to a personal laptop & a smartphone. They must sustain their incurred living expenses at farm which can be around 12 to 15k inr per month (this includes cost for accomodation, food, internet and other services). There are multiple ways to Join HackerFarm? Learn more about it below and Apply for HackerFarm. As a Learner
